description: '''Joe Holmes''' (born June 11, 1963) is an American heavy metal guitarist best known for his stint with [[Ozzy Osbourne]] between 1995 and 2001. He has also played with [[Van Halen]] frontman [[David Lee Roth]] and the L.A. band [[Lizzy Borden (band)|Lizzy Borden]] in addition to leading his own bands, Terriff, and currently, Farmikos.
